channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @dsearls Sorry, I misunderstood. Never mind.
item.source:markdown: @dsearls Sorry, I misunderstood. Never mind.

item.description: If the Dems don’t pack the court now, that might be it.
item.source:markdown: If the Dems don’t pack the court now, that might be it.

item.description: Trump Had Docs on Foreign Nation’s Nuclear Capabilities. https://t.co/pbuxFTiomh

item.description: @ScottHansonDE Good job Scott! :-)

item.description: @dsearls I tried searching for it, but it's not easy to find. What network was it on?

item.description: Peter Thiel Backs Menstrual Cycle-Focused Company. https://t.co/x3BlXUbetN
item.source:markdown: Peter Thiel Backs Menstrual Cycle-Focused Company. https://t.co/x3BlXUbetN

item.description: How One Couple Uprooted Their Life to Open an Inn in the Catskills. #nopaywall https://t.co/bFRitnHjCZ
item.source:markdown: How One Couple Uprooted Their Life to Open an Inn in the Catskills. #nopaywall https://t.co/bFRitnHjCZ

item.description:
There was an excellent MSNBC show about the Civil War last night. At one point they interviewed a current-day Confederate. They almost got to the best question to ask such a person, which is:

Would you like to be a slave?

I'd love to hear the answer. to that.
item.source:markdown:
There was an excellent MSNBC show about the Civil War last night. At one point they interviewed a current-day Confederate. They almost got to the best question to ask such a person, which is:
Would you like to be a slave?
I'd love to hear the answer. to that.

item.description: Judge removes Griffin from office for engaging in the January 6 insurrection. https://t.co/3NR6nRrA3C
item.source:markdown: Judge removes Griffin from office for engaging in the January 6 insurrection. https://t.co/3NR6nRrA3C

item.description: @raymondcamden that's what i want -- to dream about places to live beyond what's for sale right now. and if someone wants to pay me $10 million for my house -- hmm.
item.source:markdown: @raymondcamden that's what i want -- to dream about places to live beyond what's for sale right now. and if someone wants to pay me $10 million for my house -- hmm.

item.description: There should be an inverse real estate market where buyers could list their requirements. Sellers could peruse, the way buyers scan Zillow now. Who knows if I'm looking in the right geography? There could be lots of places that match my desires.
item.source:markdown: There should be an inverse real estate market where buyers could list their requirements. Sellers could peruse, the way buyers scan Zillow now. Who knows if I'm looking in the right geography? There could be lots of places that match my desires.

item.description: @jayrosen_nyu @HC_Richardson @Will_Bunch we let them make that decision for us.
item.source:markdown: @jayrosen_nyu @HC_Richardson @Will_Bunch we let them make that decision for us.

item.description: Most tweets promote the author rather than good ideas, although they think they're promoting good ideas. Most of the people who read them, if any do, already agree with them, or don't and are using their tweets to evoke strong body chemistry that they are physically addicted to.
item.source:markdown: Most tweets promote the author rather than good ideas, although they think they're promoting good ideas. Most of the people who read them, if any do, already agree with them, or don't and are using their tweets to evoke strong body chemistry that they are physically addicted to.

item.description:
I'm watching The Bear on Hulu. Really good. https://t.co/FCC1as1056

As I watch it, I realize how far we are in software development from the coordination of creativity you see in the kitchen of this small restaurant, understanding it's a dramatization and not to take it too literally.
item.source:markdown:
I'm watching The Bear on Hulu. Really good. https://t.co/FCC1as1056
As I watch it, I realize how far we are in software development from the coordination of creativity you see in the kitchen of this small restaurant, understanding it's a dramatization and not to take it too literally.
